question: Which of the following payments can NOT be done using BBPS as of now (2020)?
explanation: BBPS covers repetitive payments for everyday utility services such as electricity, water, gas, telecom (mobile postpaid, landline postpaid, broadband) and Direct-to-Home (DTH). Gradually, the scope would be expanded to include other types of repetitive payments like insurance premium, mutual funds, school fees, EMI\"s, municipal taxes etc.
